description: This one-day event aims to unite Debian enthusiasts, free software contributors, and the FOSS community, providing a platform to explore open-source software, engage in hands-on sessions, and contribute to Debian projects. Participants will also have the opportunity to enhance documentation, write code, and network with industry experts. Join us for an immersive open-source experience!

Stuck in code chaos? Scared of losing your work? Want to collaborate like a pro? . Join us for an exciting journey into version control that will transform your coding life forever!, Whether you’re a complete beginner or a code wizard , you’ll discover the magic of Git and GitHub.
This conference is about building a digital world where your privacy matters. We'll discuss how to create better, safer technology, different from big techs like WhatsApp.
